properties.areaDesc: Bedford, PA; Fulton, PA; Franklin, PA
properties.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued January 8 at 8:11AM EST until January 8 at 9:00AM EST by NWS State College PA
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a

* Snow Squall Warning for...
Central Bedford County in south central Pennsylvania...
West central Franklin County in south central Pennsylvania...
Central Fulton County in south central Pennsylvania...

* Until 900 AM EST.

* At 811 AM EST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line
extending from 7 miles east of Central City to Saluvia, moving east
at 40 mph.

HAZARD...Extremely poor visibility in snow and blowing snow. Wind
gusts greater than 30 mph.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.

* This includes the following Interstates...
Interstate 70 from mile markers 147 to 150.
The Pennsylvania Turnpike from mile markers 142 to 178.
Interstate 99 from mile markers 0 to 8.

Locations impacted include...
Bedford, Breezewood, Everett, McConnellsburg, Osterburg,
Harrisonville, Fort Loudon, Crystal Springs, Wells Tannery, St.
Clairsville, Valley-Hi, Saluvia, Cessna, Sideling Hill Rest Area,
Schellsburg and New Paris.
properties.instruction:
Consider avoiding or delaying travel until the snow squall passes
your location. If you must travel, use extra caution and allow extra
time. Rapid changes in visibility and slick road conditions may lead
to accidents.

Wet roadways will quickly freeze. Black ice will cause roads, bridges
and overpasses to become slick and dangerous. Slow down and be
prepared for sudden loss of traction.

CMAMtext: Snow Squall Warning til 9:00 AM EST. Sudden whiteouts. Icy roads. Slow down! -NWS
